Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey <MYNAME>, congrats on the win! I dunno if
it was just me, but that outfit you put together
just leapt out at me today!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Congrats! Heh heh, it's no surprise that my gal
has fashion sense to spare!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Wait...but if you always look that great, then
won't that mean I'll just fade into the
background?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey <MYNAME>, congrats on the win!
<PAGE>
Man, you sure have great fashion sense.
<PAGE>
But y'know...I don't really care what you wear.
You're beautiful to me no matter what, 'cause I
love you. ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Great job today, <MYNAME>! This fashion show
sure was a blast, huh?
<PAGE>
Results are important, yeah, but even a win
would feel empty if you weren't havin' fun! I'm
already feelin' pumped for next time! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Even if you didn't win, <MYNAME>, I think your
outfit was the swankiest one up there!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Hey, maybe you should've been your own model
and strolled down the catwalk yourself. I think
you would'a smoked the competition!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Man, all the outfits you make are so cool,
<MYNAME>. I'm jealous.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Even if you didn't get the blue ribbon today,
being able to make your own clothes makes you
a winner in my book!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Woohoo! The world has finally acknowledged
my groundbreaking fashion sense! Can't wait for
everyone to start dressin' like me.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, look! I won! You've always got my
back in whatever I try to do, so I dedicate this
win to you...
<PAGE>
Wait, what do you mean I should decline the
prize? Why would I do that?!
<PAGE>
Huh? You were just kidding? Hmph...! That
emotional scarring's gonna last until at least
dinnertime!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>! Check it out, I won! Ain't that
cool?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>So once we get home, I think a reward's in
order. Like say, I dunno...maybe a kiss would be
nice...haha, just kidding...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Wha? You will?! Woohoo! Suddenly that blue
ribbon doesn't seem like the real prize anymore!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What the heck? How can that judge not see my
groundbreaking fashion sense? Is his fancy-
pants monocle all smudged up or something?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Dang it! My plan to show off how awesome I
am by winning this contest and making you fall
even more in love with me is ruined!
<PAGE>
Did the judge notice how, uh, worn out in the
seat that outfit was?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ugh...I really burned myself out today.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, when we get home, I could really
use a pick-me-up. Maybe some pampering...
<PAGE>
Please? If you console me, I'm sure I'll bounce
back just as good as before.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder how many outfits most people have.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Me? I don't have that many. If I had the money
for clothes, I'd probably spend it on somethin' to
eat instead!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I've got groundbreaking taste in fashion, y'know!
<PAGE>
I don't actually own all that many outfits, since
money is a liiiittle scarce these days, but I totally
ooze personal style. ♪
<PAGE>
Though, I'll be the first to admit that my taste is
so high-level that, to the untrained eye, it may
seem like I just throw on whatever's clean.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I always thought your daily wardrobe seemed to
be in particularly good taste. Congratulations on
winning the show.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. I must admit,
though, that as your significant other, I am of
two minds about your victory.
<PAGE>
After today, many more gentlemen will surely
take note of your clothes and realize how
attractive you truly are.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. I'm happy your
excellent taste in fashion has been recognized.
<PAGE>
We ought to celebrate tonight. Is there any dish
in particular you'd like? I'll take care of
everything.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Ah well. In the end, fashion tastes boil down to
little more than personal opinion. Just hard work
may not be enough to overcome that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>However...I think it's far too soon to consider
giving up.
<PAGE>
If you take the time to study and polish your
appearance, I'm sure you'll eventually develop a
winning combination.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, <MYNAME>. You gave it your best. If
you want to take your mind off things, perhaps
we can stop by somewhere on the way home.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, <MYNAME>. It's unfortunate you
didn't win, but you gave a rousing effort.
<PAGE>
Is there anything you'd like for dinner tonight? I'll
make whatever you're in the mood for.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>On days like today, there's nothing wrong with
asking for a little pampering. There isn't much
else I could do for you, anyway.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm still surprised that I won. But I'm happy, too.
<PAGE>
After all, I'd be rather depressed if I had been
dismissed as just another old man with a mid-
life crisis and no fashion sense.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Hm? I don't look old enough to be having a mid-
life crisis? I appreciate the vote of confidence,
but I'm getting on in years...

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good job today, <MYNAME>. Well? Do you love
me even more now that my impeccable taste
has been vetted by a judge?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Er...I was only joking. You don't need to nod
so...vigorously.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I certainly went all-in today. I simply couldn't let
myself seem the unattractive slob with you here
to watch.
<PAGE>
If that hadn't been enough to win, all that effort I
put in would have turned right back around and
depressed me for days.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's unfortunate I didn't win, but ah well. I guess
all this means is that this is the extent of my
fashion sense.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I may not have won, but I am still glad that I
was able to compete with you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I know I will remember it fondly. That in itself
makes today worth the effort I put in.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today was very enjoyable. I'm glad I had the
chance to compete against you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I may not have won, but the chance to stand on
the same stage as you is worth far more to me
than a blue ribbon.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I enjoy the Fashion Fiesta. It brings out a side of
people you don't often get to see.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Marian's enthusiasm for events like these is off
the charts.
<PAGE>
Just watching is enough to have him bouncing
with glee. But should he participate...whew. He
buries the needle. I can't keep up with that.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congrats, <MYNAME>! No matter what the
subject, I like knowledgeable folks with good
taste.
<PAGE>
I'd love it if you could give me some pointers on
my wardrobe someday.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congrats, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>That was a great outfit. Just thinking of you
wearing it was all it took to make my heart skip
a beat.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But...I have to apologize to you, too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>See, uh, after I thought that, I felt jealous that
other guys would see you all dressed up and
beautiful.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I never wanted to be that kind of boyfriend.
Heck, I never even thought I was the possessive
type.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congrats, <MYNAME>. I've always thought you
had good taste.
<PAGE>
I was pretty sure you'd win today, too. Glad that
wasn't just a husband's bias.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I actually really liked your outfit choices today,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
So even if you didn't win, getting other people to
like your handiwork is a sign of your potential, I
think.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congrats, <MYNAME>. Yeah, I like the outfit you
debuted today the best.
<PAGE>
Ah, I was just thinking that, if you wore what
your model wore for the show, you'd look like an
entirely different person.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'll always like your normal look most, though. I
think it really lets your personality shine through.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Kinda lame you didn't win, but this kind of show
runs on opinions. If someone else was the
judge, I'll bet the result would've been different.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You've got a talent that'll really shine if you just
give it some more polish, I think. You're just
getting warmed up.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Don't worry. Today might not have been a
sweeping victory, but I'm sure you'll win
someday. Not a doubt in my mind.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
People keep pestering me to enter one of these
shows someday.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Never mind how good my fashion sense is or
isn't, I'd be way too embarrassed to strut my
clothing ideas on a stage.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
People can look completely different just by
changing a few things like their clothing and
hairstyle.
<PAGE>
That goes double for girls. It's amazing how they
can switch looks just like that.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations. I am glad your excellent sense
of taste has been formally recognized.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations on your victory. However, please
save the celebration until after we have returned
home.
<PAGE>
Gracing anyone and everyone with that brilliant
smile of yours is keeping us from spending time
together as a couple.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>And it seems you don't understand in the
slightest. Goodness, it would be nice if you
could realize what I go through sometimes.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations. I know better than any just how
impeccable your sense of taste is...
<PAGE>
But it seems it is even more spectacular in the
eyes of others. As your husband, I am very
proud to have you as my spouse.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done today, <MYNAME>. I heard that
during rehearsal, the model was so nervous they
tripped during their introduction...
<PAGE>
But I saw no sign of that nervousness during the
actual show. Everything seemed to go off
without a hitch.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Results are important, but they don't tell the full
story. It is unfortunate that you did not win this
time...
<PAGE>
But I am sure you have learned some valuable
lessons from the experience. Do not feel too
disheartened.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Someday, you will benefit from what you
learned today. When that time comes, you will
stand triumphant. Of that I am certain.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, <MYNAME>. It is unfortunate you
didn't win today.
<PAGE>
But do not let yourself become too disheartened.
Let's just start focusing on next time.
<PAGE>
Let me know if there is anything I can do to
help. I will aid you however I'm able.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I decided to enter today's show in order to see
what others thought of my personal sense of
taste...
<PAGE>
And it seems that, even in the eyes of others,
my taste is impeccable. Which is as it should
be, really. I feel much better now.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What, surprised to see someone who disdains
the spotlight as much as I take to the stage
today?
<PAGE>
Well, I do like to show off for my ladyfriend
every once in a while, you know.
<PAGE>
Besides, as the owner of an antique shop, I do
have some confidence in my sense of taste.
Today proved that confidence well-founded.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Aah, there you are <MYNAME>. What did you
think of me, today?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Being married means we get to see each other
every day, which can cause some of the novelty
to wear off.
<PAGE>
So today, I decided I would like to show you a
different side of myself. That I managed to win
as well is a nice bonus.
<PAGE>
Well? I hope I at least managed to make your
heart skip a beat or two.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since I went to the trouble of entering today's
contest, I was hoping for a good result. Ah well.
I guess today simply wasn't my day.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I may not have won today, but I did have the
opportunity to stand on the same stage as you.
That alone was quite entertaining.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well? My primary goal today was to show you a
different side of myself and give you one more
thing to fall in love with.
<PAGE>
I may not have won, but I hope I at least
managed to make your heart skip a beat or three.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Austere and elegant, yet neither pompous nor
gaudy. That is the style I attempt to adhere to.
<PAGE>
It is partly because my job requires I interact
with customers, but ultimately, it's my own
personal taste.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
People often say not to judge a person by their
appearance, but first impressions are often
greatly influenced by looks.
<PAGE>
Thus it seems difficult to me to entirely ignore a
person's appearance.
<PAGE>
Nothing bad can come of tidying oneself up, so
putting at least some effort into one's
appearance seems wise.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't know much about fashion stuff, but what
you had looked kinda nice, I guess. Congrats.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, you won. Congrats. Your outfit did look
pretty good up there today.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
When all the models lined up on stage, your
outfit was the one that jumped out at me. Right
then, I knew you'd clinched the win.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You lost? Yeah, looks like it. No big deal. All
you've gotta do is win next time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>What're you staring at me for? Did I say
something weird?
<PAGE>
Just so you know, don't expect any consolation
outta me. If that's what you're looking for, go
ask somebody else.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You okay, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Er, it's nothing. I was just, uh, wondering if you
were feeling down about losing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>N-not like I was gonna try to cheer you up or
anything! I'm not good at that stuff. A-anyway,
I'm just glad you're okay.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Everything's done, right? C'mon, let's get ready
to go.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Is there anything you wanna have for dinner
tonight? Speak up now, I'm takin' requests.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>So uh...ahem...can you, um...cheer up? Please?
It doesn't feel right to see you not smiling.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't really know much about fashion stuff...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...but putting a little effort into looking nice
every now and then seems like a fun change of
pace.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm surprised people are okay with putting their
own fashion designs up on stage for everybody
to stare at like that.
<PAGE>
I guess they've gotta have a lot of confidence in
their taste. Me, I could never do that.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, congrats, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'm no fashion expert, the outfit you had your
model wear today had some fantastic
coordination going on.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congrats, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
That outfit you put together today? Totally on a
different level than those others.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>At first I thought I was just biased, but it looks
like the judge felt the same way.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. You churn out
amazing outfits like it's some kind of biological
function.
<PAGE>
For me, there are some clothes I know I could
never do justice to. I'm jealous.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was an amazing outfit. Did you make it
yourself?
<PAGE>
If you did, just having it all ready and that well
done in time for the show must have taken a
crazy amount of work. Good job!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hey <MYNAME>. Good job today. It's too
bad about you not winning and all, but don't let
it get to you.
<PAGE>
Sure, it'd be nice to come home with that blue
ribbon, but at the end of the day...
<PAGE>
...shows like this aren't so much about the
competition, they're about the entrants and the
audience coming together for a fun time.
<PAGE>
If you had fun, I'd call the day a success. That's
how I look at it.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good job up there today, <MYNAME>. I'm kinda
bummed you didn't win, but you've got the verve
to sweep the show next time.
<PAGE>
I only dabble in fashion, but my flower arranging
does give me a leg up when it comes to color
coordination.
<PAGE>
I might be able to help you out next time, if
you're interested.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm always curious about what might look good
on me, so shows like this are pretty educational.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Speaking of fashion shows, the town I used to
live in had a unique fashion tradition.
<PAGE>
They called it the Flower Dress Show. You'd use
slim wire to make the frame of a dress, then
weave flowers into it...
<PAGE>
Eventually, you'd have an entire dress made out
of flowers. All the entries in the show were
made like that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Seeing that for the first time floored me. I had
no idea you could do that with flowers!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your fashion sense is actually not half-bad.
<PAGE>
I may have to revise my opinion of you...slightly.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. Of course, I
thought it was only natural that you won.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>After all, I knew your outfit was perfectly
coordinated. And I say that not out of personal
bias, of course.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, <MYNAME>. Congratulations are in
order.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>That your tastes in fashion were becoming more
refined was not just idle fancy on my part, it
seems.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, nothing. I guess this may call for some sort
of celebration, then. What would you like for
tonight's menu?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hello <MYNAME>. It is unfortunate you
didn't win today.
<PAGE>
Still, your fashion sense wasn't entirely
appalling, so I would think there is hope for you
yet.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Not that you could hold a candle to me, of
course, should I ever choose to make a serious
attempt at fashion design.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a pity you didn't win, but don't lose heart.
<PAGE>
Fashion sense shines more brightly the more it is
polished. Just because today wasn't your day
doesn't mean you are doomed.
<PAGE>
If you allowed yourself to be depressed over
these small setbacks, you'd be a wreck! Now
chin up, you'd best start preparing for next time.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Official results aside, I think you made a
wonderful showing, <MYNAME>. Hm? Are you
feeling down?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>It hardly feels right, to see you so depressed.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Well, I suppose I shall have to do something
about that! Tonight, I'll make your favorite, so
cheer up. Okay?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SPECIAL>
Oho ho ho! There is no reason why I would not
have won.
<PAGE>
The outfit was perfect, of course, and the model
also did an excellent job. This was the obvious
conclusion.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ohohohoho! It's only fitting that I won. Well,
<MYNAME>? What did you think of my grand
showing today?
<PAGE>
I WAS victorious, after all. Even you must have
thought the outfit I entered was, er...a little, ah,
cute. Right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...! I-I appreciate your straightforward honesty,
but I wasn't prepared for your candor!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Consider yourself fortunate, <MYNAME>, for
having a cute wife with impeccable fashion
sense, like me!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Er...y-you didn't have to agree with such a
beaming smile, you know! Goodness!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I cannot believe that judge was unable to realize
my sterling fashion sense. What on earth wasn't
good enough?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Wh-what. Did you come to console me? W-well
you didn't need to, as I'm not at all distressed
about not winning. Not in the least!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>What...? You think the outfit I chose today was
adorable? And you want to see me wear it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>H-hmph...! Goodness, you can be so
demanding. But I suppose I could oblige your
request sometime...perhaps while on a date.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Rrgh, how frustrating! How could the judge have
chosen anyone but me? I stayed up all night
working on the finishing touches, too!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>That does it! Tonight is comfort food night! A
full three courses! You will be joining me of
course, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In high society, anyone who chooses
unfashionable or tasteless clothing is quickly
laughed out of the room.
<PAGE>
Accordingly, my taste and grasp of current
fashion trends have become quite keen over the
years.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I wouldn't mind giving you a few tips about
what styles are currently in vogue, if you'd like.
<PAGE>
Of course, everything will have changed again
inside a month, I'm sure. The currents of fashion
are ever-changing, you know.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
My mansion here is on the small and cozy side,
so I was only able to bring about one tenth of
my full wardrobe with me.
<PAGE>
With that little on hand, it is frustratingly difficult
to put together an appropriately fashionable
outfit each day.
<PAGE>
Perhaps I should have thought about keeping a
personal tailor on my staff.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. Your outfit was
splendid. You really do have excellent fashion
sense.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Congratulations. Your outfit today looked so
sharp and put-together.
<PAGE>
I've always liked people who appreciate good
quality. Ohoho...you just like casually adding
new reasons for me to fall for you, don't you?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. Your outfit really
had all the hallmarks of great design.
<PAGE>
We ought to have a celebration tonight. I think
I'll make some of your favorites, so bring your
appetite!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Winning isn't everything, you know. In these
sorts of contests, the most important thing is to
entertain the audience.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>In that regard, today's contestants all succeeded
beautifully, since I know everyone here had a
great time.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Is it all right for you to head home now,
<MYNAME>? Then let's go together.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh dear...do you think I'm just being considerate
because you lost?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ohoho! Winning and losing have nothing to do
with it. I just want to spend as much time with
you as I can.
<PAGE>
If it means we can be together, I can fabricate as
many excuses as you'd like.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, <MYNAME>. It's unfortunate that you
didn't win, but everyone has days like these, you
know.
<PAGE>
The most important thing is to learn from what
happened today and put that toward improving
yourself for next time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'll help you however I can. Let's both think of
what we can do to snatch that blue ribbon next
time.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ohoho. This is quite the turn of events.
<PAGE>
Winning in a fashion show is public
acknowledgment that one has excellent taste.
That's a real self-confidence booster for anyone.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, <MYNAME>? What did you think of my
fashion choices today? Were they truly
outrageous?
<PAGE>
Perhaps I should try it on and let you see a
beautifully bold side of myself!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh my goodness, I can't believe I won! Though
I'd be even happier if I knew you had a special
prize in store for me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>No, it needn't be an object. In fact, what I'm
really hoping to get doesn't have a shape at all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ohoho! How about you think about it a little, and
we'll compare answers when we get home?
